rule: The classification can be based on secondary aspects of the content, allowing multiple categories to represent the input text's topics.
input: The article discusses both international trade and environmental policies.
validityText:
The input provided is only a single sentence that briefly mentions the topics of international trade and environmental policies. According to the input specification, the input must be a complete news article suitable for classification into specified categories. A single sentence does not fulfill the requirement of being a complete article.

ERR
